resources.string: You\'re not connected with the internet. For this game you need an internet connection. Please check if your wifi is on. \nStart the app again when you have a connection.
Land your spaceship on the target

You are a member of an extra-terrestial intelligence. You and your spaceship are on a mission to help the humans to solve their problems everywhere on earth.


Before you enter the atmosphere, you receive your landing target from the mothership. Your target consists of a series of names, starting with a country. Every next name marks your target more specifically. As you are descending, the next name from your target list will show up on the map. Find this next location from the series, and navigate your ship towards it. At about 2000 meters, the target symbol will show up on the map.


If you do not find your next location, you will get lost. You can gain altitude again by pressing the red button of the Emergency Booster (E.B.). Be aware: there's only fuel for 10 seconds! The fuel of your steering rockets is limited too.


This landing task appeals to your geographical knowledge. When you succeed, you wil be promoted. Perhaps you will eventually become Admiral of the Fleet! Push 'start' to begin your mission.
